summary:
The Poison Rose is a 2019 American thriller film starring John Travolta and Morgan Freeman. The film was directed by George Gallo. It was written by Richard Salvatore, Francesco Cinquemani and Luca Giliberto, based on Salvatore's novel of the same title.
The film was released on May 24, 2019 by Lionsgate.
cast:
John Travolta as PI Carson Phillips
Morgan Freeman as Doc
Ella Bleu Travolta as Rebecca Hunt
Brendan Fraser as Dr. Miles Mitchell
Famke Janssen as Jayne Hunt
Peter Stormare as Slide
Robert Patrick as Chief Walsh
Kat Graham as Rose
Claudia Gerini as Violet Gregory
Nick Vallelonga as Nick the Giant Bodyguard
